sdata.e: As good luck would have it, a steamer passed by and they were saved.

sdata.j: もし↑彼↑↓かれ↓がそのと|き↑戦場↑↓せん|じょう↓に↑行↑↓い↓くのを↑拒否↑↓きょひ↓していたら、↑彼↑↓かれ↓はまだ↑生↑↓い↓きていただろうに。
sdata.e: He would still be alive had he refused to go to the battlefield then.
